other_tests.findings: A pedunculated polypoid lesion of the gastric fornix 8 mm from the esophagogastric junction, covered with a smooth, whitish mucosal layer.
Shadow defect in the gastric fornix, dull angle of His, and severe gastroesophageal reflux observed.

The epithelium composed of multilayered columnar epithelium around the pedicle and multilayered squamous epithelium at the apex; edematous subepithelial stroma; structures mimicking bronchial glands; layer of cartilage in an inverted U-shape in the stroma.
